name: Sweetie
descriptions: Sweetie is a bisexual female prostitute working for Pretty Sarah at the Casa Madrid Apartments in Fallout: New Vegas.
The most attractive woman in Westside and a house favorite at the Casa,

She is a smart woman perfectly aware of who she is, and approaches her work like any other job. Her clients can count on discretion, though privacy a good like any other. With the right amount of caps, she'll share secrets,
Beyond a business mindset, she can also show biting wit.
As Sweetie takes both male and female clients, her homophobic co-worker, Maude, considers her a pervert

topics.response_text: {Player in combat}Look out!
I bring in the customers, and she makes sure no one gets rough. Sarah's good people. Good enough, anyway.
I'm called Sweetie because I'm the sweetest piece you'll find anywhere outside of the Strip. I could work in those casinos if I wanted.

topics.topic_text: Wouldn't you make more money working on the Strip?
topics.response_text: I got my start at the Gomorrah, good money, but I saw how those Omertas hook girls on free Jet or Med-X - then start charging.

topics.topic_text: How much does it cost to hire you?
topics.response_text: It's worth every cap, baby. I'll do things to you you didn't think was possible, and leave you feeling like everything's right in the world.
Get ready, honey. I'm going to make it good for you.
You know you'll be back.

topics.topic_text: <300 caps needed> I don't have enough on me right now...
topics.response_text: Then I guess you won't be getting on me, either. Improve your prospects and come back, sugar. I'll be waiting.
Keep telling yourself that, sugar. You'll be back.

topics.topic_text: Does Saint James pay you for anything "unusual"?
topics.response_text: A client's got a right to privacy. So it'll cost 200 caps for me to tell you all about it.

topics.topic_text: Let's say 100 caps. Or you could earn zero keeping your mouth shut.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{mischievous}Funny how I make caps every time I open my mouth.
Saint James has problems, that's for sure. Never wants me to say a thing, or for me to move around, either.
Then I guess there's no need for us to keep talking, honey. Sorry.{pitying}
Fine by me. You the one missing out on exciting details.
Sure do. Saint James is my number one customer. He's a prospector who pays Marco to stay here at the Casa week to week.

topics.topic_text: Any chance you could help me get into Saint James' room?
topics.response_text: {Saint James dead}Since he's dead, I don't think he'll mind. Here.

topics.topic_text: I'll pay you for the key.
topics.response_text: We can come to a deal. My price is firm, though - Saint James is a good customer and it better be worth it if I'm going to lose him.

topics.topic_text: {Cherchez La Femme}We girls need to stick together, and this'll be our secret.
topics.response_text: I could never resist a woman like you. Here, take the key, but don't tell anyone where you go it.

topics.topic_text: {Lady Killer}You'd say no to a guy like me? And here I thought you were special...
topics.response_text: {playful}Oh, don't you dare play that game with me. Fine, here's the key since it's so important to you. Just don't say where you got it.
{cheerful, forgiving}Already forgotten!
And here's your key.

topics.topic_text: <250 caps needed>I can't meet your price right now.
topics.response_text: Too bad. No caps, no key.
